[color=blue][size=4][b]My.Big.Fat.Greek.Wedding.2.2016.HD-TS.XVID.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8[/b][/size][/color]

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time 

Sources:

Video: Latino DVD-R
Audio: Exclusive-cpg/Thor Line
thx


Notes:
Waited for the source-dvd, this one doesnt have the framerate problems(30 frames) and videoquality is a lot nicer.

Another perfect release, best possible Video and best possible Line combined for this blockbuster.
One good release is the way to go, patience
thx for everyone involved


Encode:
Videoquality was very nice already, added sharpness,brightness,contrast,fixed rgb and removed the flicker.

Line Audio was nice, just had a lot of oos spots, needed 40 cuts, now all is lipsync as usually :=)

got very nice and will do me till retail
enjoy
